”Voices of Europe” is a series of t ape recorded inter¬
views with Europeans who are ”alive and sensitive to the trag®
edy and dilemma of the conditions that surround them*”
Among the interviewees is Dr* Martin Niemoeller, probably
Germany8s most famous clergyman. Pastor Niemoeller is the
president of the Evangelical Church of the German States of
Hessau and Nassau*
These interviews were conducted this summer by Milton
Mayer of the University of Chicago who was serving as Visit®
ing Professor of Social Research at the University of Frank®
fort this past year* Mr* Mayer is a well known author, lee®
turer, and broadcaster*
